title: North Charleston to pay $6.5M settlement to family of unarmed black man shot by cop
text:
Published By: Al.com: Birmingham - Today 
A city in South Carolina approved a $6.5M settlement Thursday with the family of an unarmed black man shot to death earlier this year by a w...
